refnamediv.refpurpose: assign inputs to outputs (with duplication if needed).

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: When used with a single input argument, this input is duplicated to be set to all output arguments.
When used with multiple input arguments, the number of output arguments must be the same and in this case, each input value is set to the corresponding output value.

refsection.title: Remarks
refsection.para: In many cases the deal function can be replaced by the [out1, ... ountN] = (in1, ... inN) syntax (See brackets).
deal function is really useful when you need to assign a single value to multiple variables.
deal function can also be used to initialize the contents of cells or structs (See examples below).
